attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Seems the governments new 'taxes' are centred around 'climate change'. This subject is a farce and does not exist. We petition the government to dismiss all climate change groups and dismantle all departments that have anything to do with climate change. We also ask that the government stop wasting public money on this subject. In fact STOP wasting any money on it.
